name: GMail INBOX VICTORY !!!
description:
Inspired by Evan Roth's inbox victory.
When GMail's Inbox is empty a huge ULTRA MAXIMUM FREDDY MERCURY appears to celebrate INBOX VICTORY!!!

http://inbox-victory.com/
http://fffff.at/inbox-victory/

---

For installing in Google Chrome as a userscript: Download the .user.js file to desktop, then open Extensions (you may type chrome://extensions in the address bar) and drop the file there - "Drop to install" message will appear.
